contexts.summary: Initial clone, build verification, comprehensive code review, comparative framework analysis (Playwright/FlaUI/PAD/Rust), performance optimization roadmap, updated REVIEW.md, TODO.md, USER_MANUAL.md

Implementation session: MCP configs, Python perf fixes (pg.PAUSE, ImageDraw, print, ThreadPool bound), PowerShell->stdlib (winreg/locale/platform), Bearer auth with DPAPI, PyO3 Rust scaffold (system_info), Build.ps1 with CargoTools. 140->184 tests.
